attributes.name: Task Assignee Team
values: HLAN Bus App - Asset Suite Access

bridgedResources.name: Approver by Role - General - BPO Req
Approver by Role - General - No BPO

indexDefinitions.name: values[Contract Requisition Approval - Contract Change Request Approval]
parts: values[Contract Requisition Approval - Contract Change Request Approval]

elements.name: Header Text
elements.text:
Asset Suite is a common commercial software tool used by at the Hanford site for:

  • Contract Management
  • Accounts Payable
  • Inventory
  • Purchasing

To gain access to Asset Suite, please complete the form below. You may also use this form to request changes to roles and / or approval levels.

Users must be entered in Hanford PeopleCore (HPC) and be listed in PopFon for their Asset Suite Access to be setup.

elements.name: Detailed Information
elements.text:
Asset Suite is a common commercial software tool used by at the Hanford site for:

  • Contract Management
  • Accounts Payable
  • Inventory
  • Purchasing

To gain access to Asset Suite, please complete the form below. You may also use this form to request changes to roles and / or approval levels.

Users must be entered in Hanford PeopleCore (HPC) and be listed in PopFon for their Asset Suite Access to be setup.

elements.name: Role Descriptions Help
elements.text: Select one (1) role below which best relates to your job function and needs for Asset Suite. Please read Role Descriptions before selecting.

elements.name: Role Help
elements.text: Note: Profiles/Approvals requested will replace the current Profiles/Approvals assigned. If you are unsure of your current profile or approval levels, please contact ^BMS Asset Suite Administration for assistance.

choices.label: Material / Service Requester / BTR - Catalog ID Setup
choices.value: Material / Service Requester / BTR - Catalog ID Setup

events.name: Set BPO Not Req
events.runIf: values('General Users Role')=="Read Only" || values('General Users Role')=="Material / Service Requester / BTR / CAM"
events.bridgedResourceName: Approver by Role - General - No BPO

mappings.value: ${resources('Approver by Role - General - No BPO:Approver Team')}

events.name: Set BPO Req
events.runIf: values('General Users Role')==="Material / Service Requester / BTR - Catalog ID Setup"
events.bridgedResourceName: Approver by Role - General - BPO Req

mappings.value: ${resources('Approver by Role - General - BPO Req:Approver Team')}

elements.name: Justification

renderAttributes.data-help-text: Please include a justification for this role selection.

elements.required: values('General Users Role')==="Material / Service Requester / BTR - Catalog ID Setup"

events.name: Set BPO-Spare Parts

elements.name: Authorized Companies
elements.text: This role is only available to employees of HMIS, CPCCO, WRPS, HLMI, MSA, and CHPRC. For further assistance, please contact ^BMS Asset Suite Administration.
elements.visible: (values('Responsible Company')!="HMIS") && (values('Responsible Company')!="MSA") && (values('Responsible Company')!="CPCCO") && (values('Responsible Company')!="CHPRC") && (values('Responsible Company')!="HLMI") && (values('Responsible Company')!="WRPS") && (values('Role')=="Spare Parts") && (values('Role')=="Acquisitions Staff") && (values('Role')=="Accounts Payable")

elements.name: Authorized Approval Amounts Text
elements.text: Asset Suite Users Authorization for Dollar Approval Level

elements.name: Authorized Approval Amounts Help
elements.text:
Enter required dollar approval amounts for available objects. This approval amount applies to each approval of an object.

Note: Review and approval as a Subject Matter Expert or Technical Authority does not require a specified approval amount. Only the final approver on the route list or those who approve an item without creating a route list are required to be assigned an approval amount.

elements.name: Material Request Approval
elements.visible: (values('General Users Role')=="Material / Service Requester / BTR / CAM") || (values('General Users Role')=="Material / Service Requester / BTR - Catalog ID Setup") || (values('Spare Parts Role')=="Material / Service Requester / BTR - Facility Spares Rep") || (values('Spare Parts Role')=="Material / Service Requester / BTR - Design Authority") || (values('Spare Parts Role')=="Material / Service Requester / BTR - Technical Authority") || (values('Spare Parts Role')=="Material / Service Requester / BTR - Tank Farm Engineer") || (values('Acquisitions Staff Role')=="Acquisition Administration") || (values('Acquisitions Staff Role')=="Acquisition Support") || (values('Inventory Role')=="Commodity Manager") || (values('Inventory Role')=="Commodity Manager with CC Admin") || (values('Inventory Role')=="Inventory / Warehouse Manager") || (values('Inventory Role')=="Warehouse Clerk") || (values('Inventory Role')=="QC Inspection Manager") || (values('Inventory Role')=="QAE with QC Inspection")

elements.name: Contract Requisition Approval - Contract Change Request Approval
elements.visible: (values('General Users Role')=="Material / Service Requester / BTR / CAM") || (values('General Users Role')=="Material / Service Requester / BTR - Catalog ID Setup") || (values('Spare Parts Role')=="Material / Service Requester / BTR - Facility Spares Rep") || (values('Spare Parts Role')=="Material / Service Requester / BTR - Design Authority") || (values('Spare Parts Role')=="Material / Service Requester / BTR - Technical Authority") || (values('Spare Parts Role')=="Material / Service Requester / BTR - Tank Farm Engineer") || (values('Acquisitions Staff Role')=="Acquisition Administration") || (values('Acquisitions Staff Role')=="Acquisition Support") || (values('Inventory Role')=="Inventory / Warehouse Manager") || (values('Inventory Role')=="Warehouse Clerk") || (values('Inventory Role')=="QC Inspection Manager") || (values('Inventory Role')=="QAE with QC Inspection")

elements.name: Purchase Requisition Approval
elements.visible: (values('General Users Role')=="Material / Service Requester / BTR - Catalog ID Setup") || (values('Spare Parts Role')=="Material / Service Requester / BTR - Facility Spares Rep") || (values('Spare Parts Role')=="Material / Service Requester / BTR - Design Authority") || (values('Spare Parts Role')=="Material / Service Requester / BTR - Technical Authority") || (values('Spare Parts Role')=="Material / Service Requester / BTR - Tank Farm Engineer") || (values('Acquisitions Staff Role')=="Acquisition Administration") || (values('Acquisitions Staff Role')=="Acquisition Support") || (values('Inventory Role')=="Commodity Manager") || (values('Inventory Role')=="Commodity Manager with CC Admin") || (values('Inventory Role')=="Inventory / Warehouse Manager")

elements.name: Purchase Order Approval
elements.visible: (values('Acquisitions Staff Role')=="Contract Specialist / Manager") || (values('Inventory Role')=="JIT Clerk")
elements.label: Purchase Order Approval Amount

elements.name: Signature Based Contract Invoice Approval
elements.label: Signature Based Contract Invoice Approval Amount

elements.name: Contract Payment Authorization Approval
elements.visible: (values('Acquisitions Staff Role')=="Contract Specialist / Manager") ||(values('Acquisitions Staff Role')=="Acquisition Administration") || (values('Acquisitions Staff Role')=="Acquisition Support") || (values('Accounts Payable Role')=="AP - CPA")
elements.label: Contract Payment Authorization Approval Amount

elements.name: Invoice Approval
elements.visible: (values('Accounts Payable Role')=="AP Accountant / Approver") || (values('Accounts Payable Role')=="AP Invoice Approver")

elements.label: Invoice Total - Line Mismatch Approval Amount
